title: Dream
creator_contributor_role: Arthur Cantrill, composition and sound design
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Dreams
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Nightmares
abstract: Animation of drypoint images by artist Charles Lloyd. Sound composition by Arthur Cantrill.
description: A partly animated film based on a series of drypoint prints ('Movements' and 'Combats') by Australian printmaker Charles Lloyd on the theme of aggression in society. The sound composition by Arthur Cantrill is a mix of percussion and altered piano (plucking and hitting strings and soundboard, played by Arthur Cantrill), sound effects (including breathing), and electronically modified children's laughter, recorded on a Nagra reel to reel tape recorder and transferred to 16mm magnetic tracks which were laid and mixed in a professional sound studio, where reverberation was added to some sections.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002204; Arthur and Corinne Cantrill: Light Years; Active; 2011
